Adapt Jewel 1.description: Grants protection against environmental damage, such as from heat or cold.

Artillery Jewel 1.description: Strengthens explosive attacks like shells, Wyvern's Fire, charge blade phial attacks, and Sticky Ammo.

Intimidator Jewel 1.description: Reduces the chance small monsters will attack after spotting you. (Has no effect on certain monsters.)

Ironwall Jewel 1.description: Reduces knockbacks and stamina depletion when guarding.

Ironwall Jewel II 2.description: Reduces knockbacks and stamina depletion when guarding.

Ironwall Jewel III 3.description: Reduces knockbacks and stamina depletion when guarding.

KO Jewel 1.description: Makes it easier to stun monsters.

KO Jewel II 2.description: Makes it easier to stun monsters.

KO Jewel III 3.description: Makes it easier to stun monsters.

Leap Jewel 1.description: Prevents attacks from knocking you back during a jump.

Magazine Jewel 1.description: Improves reloading, and increases the gunlance's shell capacity and charge blade's phial capacity.

Magazine Jewel II 2.description: Improves reloading, and increases the gunlance's shell capacity and charge blade's phial capacity.

Magazine-Attack Jwl 3.description:
Improves reloading, and increases the gunlance's shell capacity and charge blade's phial capacity.
Increases attack power.

Magazine-Draw Jwl 3.description:
Improves reloading, and increases the gunlance's shell capacity and charge blade's phial capacity.
Increases affinity when performing draw attacks. (Not effective while riding.)

Magazine-Expert Jwl 3.description:
Improves reloading, and increases the gunlance's shell capacity and charge blade's phial capacity.
Increases affinity.

Magazine-Handicraft Jwl 3.description:
Improves reloading, and increases the gunlance's shell capacity and charge blade's phial capacity.
Extends the weapon sharpness gauge. However, it will not increase the gauge past its maximum.

Magazine-Ironwall Jwl 3.description:
Improves reloading, and increases the gunlance's shell capacity and charge blade's phial capacity.
Reduces knockbacks and stamina depletion when guarding

Maintenance Jewel 2.description: Reduces the recharge time for specialized tools.

Mastery Jewel 3.description: Prevents your weapon from losing sharpness during critical hits.

Medicine Jewel 1.description: Increases the amount recovered when restoring health.

Mighty Jewel 2.description: Increases affinity if stamina is kept full for a period of time.

Mind's Eye Jewel 1.description: Your attacks are deflected less and deal more damage to hard targets.

Mind's Eye Jewel II 2.description: Your attacks are deflected less and deal more damage to hard targets.

Mind's Eye Jwl III 3.description: Your attacks are deflected less and deal more damage to hard targets.

Mirewalker Jewel 1.description: Grants resistance against impairments to mobility while in water, oilsilt, or streams.
